result.arabic_text: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَكَفَّرۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَلَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
result.translation: Iyo abahawe Igitabu bemera Imana Imwe Rudende Allah n’Intumwa yayo, bakanayitinya mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa yayo, ni ukuri Twebwe Allah Twari kubababarira ibicumuro n’ivyaha vyabo, ni ukuri Twari no kubinjiza mu Bwami bw’ijuru bwuzuye inema;
